name: Mistborn Fan Game *Alpha Playtest Version*
description:
Alpha Version of the game for pretesting. Currently for windows only! I'm going to focus on the windows versions first and then move on to other ports. Once you've played through it, take as many notes as you can on your experience and let me know in the discord what you thought.

Discord:  https://discord.gg/Bd3Qm4xp
